item.title: Xiaomi’s given the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ precise arsenal to dominate strong rivals - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Xiaomi's Redmi Note 14 Pro+: A Strong Contender in the Smartphone Market

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro+ is poised to compete fiercely against flagship rivals with its advanced features and strong performance. It continues the legacy of its predecessors while introducing significant upgrades.

  • The Pro+ model builds on the successful Redmi Note series with refined design and performance.
  • Features a 6.67-inch curved display with a 120Hz refresh rate and peak brightness of 3000 nits.
  • Introduces Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip for enhanced performance.
  • Battery capacity increased to 6200mAh with new silicon carbon technology, ensuring longer usage.
  • Camera system includes a 50MP wide primary sensor and a more balanced optical setup.
“The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ has enough power under the hood to tick off the future proofing that some buyers give weightage to.”

Overall, the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ stands as a compelling option in the mid-range segment, boasting features that challenge more expensive models and cater to diverse user needs.

item.title: Huawei beats Apple, dominates wrist-worn device market for most of 2024: IDC - The Indian Express
item.description:
Huawei Beats Apple to Lead Global Wrist-Worn Device Market in 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

The wrist-worn device market sees a significant shift as Huawei overtakes Apple to secure the top position for the first three quarters of 2024, driven by robust sales of its GT5 series and blood pressure monitor.

  • Huawei has surpassed Apple in the wrist-worn wearable market for the first three quarters of 2024.
  • The top-selling products include Huawei's GT5, GT5 Pro, and Watch D2, contributing to sales growth across various regions.
  • Apple briefly regained the top spot with the Watch Series 10 but faces challenges in innovation.
  • Xiaomi holds third place with significant growth attributed to the Xiaomi Band 9 and Watch S series.
  • China is the largest market for wrist-worn devices, with 45.8 million units shipped and a 20.1% growth year-over-year.
  • Sales in India and the United States have declined compared to the previous year.
“Huawei has managed to outpace Apple in the wrist-worn device segment.”

This trend highlights Huawei's increasing dominance in the wearable market, emphasizing the need for innovation among competitors like Apple to retain market share.

item.title: Amazon Prime Users In India Will Get Less Features For Their Money In 2025: What We Mean - News18
item.description:
Amazon Prime Users in India Will Get Less Features For Their Money In 2025

Last Updated: December 20, 2024, 20:04 IST | Source: News18

Amazon Prime users in India are warned that starting January 2025, they will encounter limitations on the number of devices available for streaming, particularly affecting viewing on televisions.

  • Users will be limited to two TVs out of five devices for streaming.
  • The policy aims to limit shared access and comes amid similar changes by other platforms like Netflix.
  • This restriction represents a significant downgrade for those paying Rs 1,499 annually.
  • The term 'household' has become more relevant in streaming services' usage policies.
“Starting January 2025, we are updating our usage terms in India to include up to two TVs as part of your five devices entitlement.”

This shift indicates a broader trend among streaming services towards restricting account sharing, which has been confirmed to benefit companies like Netflix.

item.title: These images of Samsung Galaxy S25 have reportedly got some employees of Samsung fired - The Times of India
item.description:
Samsung Employees Reportedly Fired Over Galaxy S25 Images Leakage

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

This article discusses the repercussions faced by several Samsung employees due to leaked images of the upcoming Galaxy S25 smartphone.

  • The leak involved internal images of the Galaxy S25 prior to its official unveiling.
  • Reports suggest that the company's internal policy prohibits such leaks, leading to immediate disciplinary action.
  • The incident raises concerns about information security within major tech companies.
  • Employee accountability and corporate governance are highlighted as key issues in the tech industry.
“Protecting company secrets is paramount to our business operations,” a Samsung spokesperson stated.

The incident underscores the critical importance of confidentiality in tech companies, especially as competition intensifies.

item.title: Vivo X200 Pro and X200 now available for purchase in India: Check out best launch offers, price - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The Vivo X200 and X200 Pro are now available in India. Here’s everything you need to know about their prices, offers, and more.

Dec 20, 2024 | Hindustan Times

Vivo has launched the X200 series in India, which includes the Vivo X200 and X200 Pro. These devices are powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset and feature outstanding camera capabilities. They are now available for purchase with several attractive launch offers.

  • Vivo X200 is priced at ₹65,999 for the 12GB + 256GB model.
  • Vivo X200 Pro is priced at ₹94,999 for the 16GB + 512GB model.
  • Offers include no-cost EMI starting at ₹2,750/month, 10% credit card discounts, and exchange bonuses.
  • Specifications include a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 4,500 nits peak brightness for the Pro model.
  • Both models boast Zeiss optics, with the Pro featuring a 200MP camera.
“The Vivo X200 Pro gets a 6,000mAh battery with support for 90W charging.”

The launch of the Vivo X200 series marks a significant step in Vivo's smartphone offerings in India, appealing to photography enthusiasts with its advanced camera technology.

item.title: OneUI 7.0 update: Samsung to bring new user privacy feature with post-quantum cryptography security - Deccan Herald
item.description:
OneUI 7.0 update: Samsung to bring new user privacy feature with post-quantum cryptography security

Published: 20 December 2024, 07:38 IST | Source: Deccan Herald

Samsung is set to roll out the OneUI 7.0 update, introducing a significant user privacy feature known as the 'Personal Data Engine' (PDE), which employs advanced security measures to protect personal information.

  • The OneUI 7.0 update will include the 'Personal Data Engine' (PDE) to enhance user privacy.
  • PDE will safeguard personal data using encryption keys managed by Samsung's Knox Vault security system.
  • The update features post-quantum cryptography, enhancing resistance against potential hacking threats.
  • A new Now Bar feature will provide personalized app recommendations based on calendar activities.
  • Samsung plans to begin the rollout of OneUI 7.0 in January 2025, starting with the Galaxy S24 series.
"The Galaxy phone with OneUI 7.0 update will be almost impossible to hack."

In summary, the OneUI 7.0 update aims to provide users with enhanced security and personalized features, reflecting Samsung's commitment to privacy and user experience.

item.title: ChatGPT for Mac now reads your notes, writes your code, and more: Details - The Financial Express
item.description:
ChatGPT for Mac now reads your notes, writes your code, and more: Details

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Financial Express

OpenAI has announced a significant update for its ChatGPT desktop application for macOS, bringing new features that allow integration with various third-party apps, including Apple Notes and VS Code.

  • New App Integrations: Supports apps like Apple Notion, Apple Notes, Quip, BBEdit, Android Studio, and AppCode.
  • Direct Calling: Users can now interact with ChatGPT directly from their applications without switching tabs.
  • Code Writing: A new feature enables ChatGPT to assist in coding by understanding the context within different applications.
  • Accessibility: The update is available for free download on OpenAI’s website, with full access for ChatGPT Plus subscribers.
“You can call ChatGPT from your Mac for any task including drafting emails and brainstorming ideas.”

This update enhances the functionality of ChatGPT for macOS users, streamlining workflows and integrating AI capabilities into various applications.

item.title: JioTag Go launched at Rs 1,499. How India’s first Android tracker compatible with Google's Find My Device - The Economic Times
item.description:
JioTag Go launched at Rs 1,499: India’s first Android tracker compatible with Google's Find My Device

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Jio Official

The JioTag Go, India’s first Android tracker, has been launched to help users keep track of their valuable belongings through integration with Google’s Find My Device.

  • The device does not require a SIM card and uses Bluetooth 5.3 for connectivity.
  • It helps locate items like keys, wallets, and pets, minimizing loss.
  • The JioTag features a loud ringing sound that can be triggered via the JioTag app for quick locating.
  • It offers a battery life of up to one year and comes with an additional battery and lanyard.
  • Compatible with Android 9 or higher; not supported on iPhones.
  • Available for purchase at Rs 1,499 on the official website and Amazon.
"The JioTag Go is designed to help you keep track of your valuable belongings, enhancing peace of mind." - Jio spokesperson

The introduction of JioTag Go marks a significant step towards smarter tracking solutions in India, combining functionality with affordability.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro colour changing design revealed ahead of India launch- All details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro to become the world’s first colour-changing smartphone, here’s everything you need to know.

Publication Date: Dec 20, 2024Source: Hindustan Times

The Realme 14 Pro is set to launch in India soon, showcasing a unique color-changing design that has generated significant buzz in the smartphone industry.

  • The Realme 14 Pro features a innovative color-changing back panel.
  • It has received several IP ratings (P66, IP68, IP69) for durability against water and dust.
  • The smartphone is designed with a circular camera module and enhanced camera technology dubbed MagicGlow.
  • The color-changing effect activates below 16 degrees Celsius, created in collaboration with Valeur Designers.
  • The global launch is expected in January 2025, with other brands also launching new models around the same time.
“The Realme 14 Pro will become the world’s first color-changing smartphone.”

This innovative design positions Realme as a frontrunner in smartphone technology, potentially reshaping market competitiveness and consumer expectations.

item.title: WhatsApp’s New Year 2025 update: Grab these 3 festive features before they’re gone - The Financial Express
item.description:
WhatsApp’s New Year 2025 update: Grab these 3 festive features before they’re gone

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Financial Express

WhatsApp is set to brighten up the holiday season with new features designed to add a festive touch to chats and calls.

  • Festive backgrounds, filters, and effects for video calls.
  • Animated reactions using emojis like 🎊 and 🥳 that light up conversations with confetti.
  • Exclusive New Year’s sticker pack for expressing festive vibes.
“Whether you're toasting virtually or sending warm wishes to loved ones, WhatsApp’s New Year 2025 features can ensure your holiday chats and calls are lively.”

Don't miss out on these festive features, available from December 20, 2024, through January 3, 2025!

item.title: Oneplus 13 launch on January 7: 5 reasons to buy the new-gen smartphone - Hindustan Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Launching on January 7: 5 Reasons to Buy the New-Gen Smartphone

Date: December 20, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The OnePlus 13 is set to debut in India on January 7, 2025. The smartphone promises exciting upgrades, including a new design and enhanced specifications, which have created a buzz among tech enthusiasts eager for its global launch.

5 Reasons to Buy OnePlus 13

  • Improved viewing experience: Upgraded BOE X2 Quad-HD+ LTPO AMOLED display with ultrasonic fingerprint sensor and peak brightness of 4500nits.
  • Performance beast: Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 40% faster than the previous generation.
  • Flagship camera: Triple camera setup fine-tuned by Hasselblad featuring 50MP main, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses.
  • Longer battery life: Upgraded 6000mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging capabilities.
  • New design: Available in three color options with unique finishes, including a vegan leather back panel.
“The OnePlus 13 will feature a triple camera setup consisting of a 50MP main camera, a 50MP ultrawide camera, and a 50MP periscope telephoto lens offering 3x optical zoom.”

As OnePlus gears up for the release, excitement is building for what this new smartphone will deliver in terms of innovation and performance.

item.description:
Instagram to Introduce AI Video Editing Tools in 2025

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: Afaqs

Instagram is set to roll out a generative AI editing feature next year, enabling users to modify nearly any aspect of their videos. Powered by Meta’s Movie Gen AI model, this feature aims to simplify video editing for creators.

  • New AI editing feature to launch in 2025.
  • Allows video adjustments through simple text prompts.
  • Demo showcased modifications to clothing, backgrounds, and appearances.
  • Instagram to be the first platform to integrate this technology.
“The tool aims to equip creators with advanced editing capabilities, eliminating the need for extensive video editing expertise.” - Adam Mosseri

This innovative feature is expected to change how content is created and edited on social media platforms.
